text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with a quick how to eat a burger
tip I'm down in LA working on a special
project which hopefully you've read
about on the blog and I will be filming
some real videos this weekend but I
wanted to post something today and I was
at a burger place called mommy burger
and I remembered a tip that I would like
to share when you're eating a burger out
and you take a bite don't put it down
regular leave it upside down that bottom
is much thinner
it's been sitting underneath that juicy
hot steamy burger the other side the top
of the bun is much thicker much drier
much more absorbent so I always eat my
burgers and leave them upside down on
the plate and that's how I keep my
bottom bun intact
I hate when people's buns fall apart
don't let that happen to you anyway just
a random quick burger eating tip from
chef John by the way I'm going to stop
appearing in videos now for a long time
so don't worry stay tuned for some new
videos and as always enjoy
